entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SPRINKLES
HIGHS AROUND 70
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS, BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 30

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
